Name: Rock of Sages
Ingredients: 3 whole Maraschino cherry (from jar in syrup)
1 barspoon Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
Instructions: MUDDLE cherries in base of shaker. Add sage leaves and lightly bruise with the muddler. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: As the name suggests, sage subtly influences this fruity cognac based cocktail served on the rocks. Fruity and easy.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Dominic Krempels at Archer Street, Soho, London, England. Dominic's original recipe calls for Martell XO cognac and Cocchi Storico Vermouth di Torino rosso vermouth.
